npcs.name: Anikra
utterances: I really miss my husband. Why did those smugglers have to throw him overboard?

npcs.name: Captain Varlos
utterances: Ahoy! 'Tis good to see you awake. Ya seem a little squiffy, least ya' cheated death!
Me apologies.
I am Captain Draik Varlos, and this 'ere fine ship is the Far Journey.
Me hearties pulled ya' from the sea, you an those other bilge rats. Do ya' remember?
We are heading to the Island of Refuge.
Ingrid! Quit gawking at the shorty and fix that yard-arm!
Don't want the ship to come apart in these high winds, do ya'?!
Ya think she'd never seen a gnome afore.
Whoa there, the seas are gettin' a bit angry. Go speak ta' me first mate, Waulon. He might have something for ya' ta' do.
Avast ye! We need to talk.
Well, 'tis a bit of a problem. Ya' see, there be rats on board. The vermin keep eating the supplies and I need ya' to go feed them to the deep, afore they eat anything else.
Yar! That's what we be needin'.
Wit this 'ere club. It is nice and splintered, sure ta' cause them some pain.
Ya' made quick work of them vermin.
Wait. Tis that a... No, it cain' be!
Quick! Ingrid, secure th'loot! Thar be a Drakota off the bow! Quick now! Secure those chests!
Everyone down! Watch it!
Blimey! That was close! It has been near two months since the last reported sightings of one of them.
That damnable goblin has escaped. An' look, me beautiful ship is on fire!
Ye must put an end to 'is life, afore he tears me ship apart!
Arr! Ya saved the Far Journey and me crew! Seems ya' proved ta' be quite a hero.  Well, with the help of that young lass there, ya' do.
There be the Island of Refuge, get ready ta' drop anchor. Just let me know when ya' want ta' go ashore.
Ingrid! Swing the lead and prepare to drop anchor!
So, ya' ready ta go ashore matey?
Don't ya' mind, we get paid ta' do that.
You still need to kill that landlubber of a goblin! Get to it mate!
Back ye up a few paces. I be needin' this room.

npcs.name: Geredo
utterances: Do you happen to have any mechanical leg extenders? I want to see the water.
Thinking I should design a new mechanical boat. It would be perfect! Yes, perfect indeed!

npcs.name: Helmsman Nyles
utterances: Uh... the captain does all the talking.

npcs.name: Ingrid
utterances: Aye, aye, Captain!
Hello, how are you?
I am fine, just... after the last pickup I have been working extra hard, since Vim said she would give me the piece of Luclin she found.
Yes, yes, Vim. The merchant over there. She found a small piece of the moon and is having me work for it. Maybe you can go buy it from her for me?
Maybe you have something she will buy. Why don't you go talk to her.
Ah! You got the shard. Great! Now I can stop doing this work and enjoy the rest of this trip. Here is some coin for your help.
Don't you just love the sea?
I hate rats, every time we dock they get on board and eat our supplies.
Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum!

npcs.name: Valik
utterances: I can't wait to reach the island, dry land and dry food. Fish is only good for a while, even for a Kerran.
I hear the Island of Refuge is the home of the Far Seas Trading Company. Maybe I will be able to find some work there.

npcs.name: Vim
utterances: I love traveling the seas... Oh! Did you need something?
I have some tattered clothes for sale, want to take a look?
Looking for something sturdy to wear?
The Far Journey is a beautiful ship, ain't she?

npcs.name: Waulon
utterances: What? Can't ye see? Busy, away with ye!
Wot? Oh, hey there, ye' startled me.
Can't seem ta' find me hat.
Sure! Me needs ya' ta' go lookie in them there boxes and if ye' find it, lets me know.
Where's me hat? Needs me lucky hat!
Ah, me hat! Was worried. See, dis' hat gives me the luck.
Now me is safe, thanks ta' ye. Here, take this charm. Ya' may find a use for it.
Well now, Ingrid o'er there, can show ya' the rest of the ship. Me needs ta' plot the course ta' the isles now.
